history.proof: intros m z t Hmap Hexpo. unfold degree. hfcrush use: upb_eq_degree, period_expo, expo_exd unfold: expo, degree.

ctx: intros m z t Hmap Hexpo.
exceptions.tactic: apply f_equal with (f := @length nat) in Hiter.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x y : A), x = y -> f x = f y" on hypothesis of type "Iter (f m) i z = t".

ctx: intros m z t Hmap Hexpo.
intros m z t Hmap Hexpo.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hiter was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m z t Hmap Hexpo.
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x y : A), x = y -> f x = f y d0 : fmap -> dart -> dart d : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart X0, X : forall A : Type, list A -> nat m : fmap z : dart Hmap : inv_hmap m Hexd : exd m z i : nat H0 : dart Unable to unify "degree_aux m (d (d0 m) i z) 1" with "if le_lt_dec 1 (ndN m) then if eq_dart_dec z (Iter (f m) 1 z) then 1 else if Nat.eq_dec 1 (ndN m) then ndN m + 1 else degree_aux m z (1 + 1) else ndN m + 1".

original: intros m z t Hmap Hexpo. unfold degree. destruct Hexpo as [Hexd [i Hiter]]. apply f_equal with (f := @length nat) in Hiter. unfold Iter in Hiter. rewrite Hiter. reflexivity.
